ilike 0.0.2.2

Package index

All functions

compile()
Parse .ilike file to give ilike model.
constant_velocity_x
10000 points simulated from a constant velocity linear-Gaussian dynamic model (process noise standard deviation = 1).
constant_velocity_y
10000 noisy observations (Gaussian noise, standard deviation 1) of 10000 points simulated from a constant velocity linear-Gaussian dynamic model (process noise standard deviation = 1).
enki()
Ensemble Kalman inversion
ensemble_kalman_filter()
Ensemble Kalman filter
gaussian
100 points simulated from a Gaussian distribution.
ilike
ilike: Methods for Bayesian computation when the likelihood is intractable.
importance_sample()
Importance sampler.
kalman_filter()
Kalman filter
load_enk_output()
Loading ensemble Kalman output into R memory.
load_mcmc_output()
Loading MCMC output into R memory.
load_smc_output()
Loading SMC output into R memory.
mcmc()
MCMC
particle_filter()
Particle filter
pivot_wider_smc_or_enk_output()
Take output from the functions load_smc_output or load_enk_output and convert it to a standard (non-tidy format with one column per dimension).
rdtsc_seed()
Gets a seed for random number generation by using the processor time stamp (calling rdtsc in C).
smc_mcmc_move()
SMC with an MCMC move
